strings.Value: "A monster does not think. It kills because it doesn't know any better. There is no sense in hating it. I know this... It doesn't help."
"Thinking, knowing... What's the damn difference? You look at someone's mug and your blood starts to boil. Crack his skull and keep on walking. You've got to enjoy life, you know."
"Oh, I don't know. Do they really not think at all? Trolls even have some sort of religion. I think every living creature chooses how to live — and how to behave."
"You cannot stop hating the monsters — the same way you cannot stop loving your family. Both feelings torment you, both bind your spirit, but still you are not ready to give them up."
